other.account_banned: Your account has been banned, please contact support@keyma.sh!
other.twitch_none: No one is streaming right now :( Come back later or start streaming!

debug.title: Bug Reporting
debug.message: If you experience one or more of the issues below, please click the button below and email support@keyma.sh with as much information regarding how you initially received it and how to recreate it. The more information provided will help us as it will allow us to recreate your exact issue and resolve it.

list.0: Sudden disconnect in the middle of a match
list.1: Your WPM/CPM no longer updating for yourself or other players
list.2: Your progress bar no longer updating for yourself or other players
list.3: Not seeing the end match results despite finishing the match

spectator.help_1: 1. To exit the match, use the button on the top left corner.
spectator.help_2: 2. Beside each player is a triangle with a color, this color will be matching with the caret/cursor on the text.
spectator.help_3: 3. For gamemodes utilizing the round system you will notice a highlighted orb for each round won and lost.
spectator.help_4: 4. When each player is finished make sure to hit the button on the top left corner to go back to lobby. This is intentionally made to not fully redirect you just in case you wish to see the statistics provided.

banned.title: You have been banned
banned.text: Your account has been indefinitely banned, this can be caused by a violation in our Terms and Services or cheating. If you have any questions, please contact us at

guest.title: Your Guest account has been reset
guest.text: Thank you for playing! We are glad that you are enjoying the game and we recommend that you create an account in order to save your progress in the future. For context, we remove Guest accounts that are older than 7 days.

match.no_mistakes: Awesome! You did not make a mistake during this match.
match.suspended: You have been suspended from this match due to cheating.
match.time_out: You have run out of time to complete the match. Better luck next time!
match.reconnect_failed: We have failed to reconnect you back to the match.
match.many_mistakes: You have made too many mistakes
match.statistics_unsaved: Your statistics have not been saved for this match

error404.title: The page you are looking for does not exist.
error404.message: If you were redirected to this page in error then please contact

custom.title: Title

error.team_size: Your team sizes must be exact in order to start the match.
error.unsaved: You must save your changes in order to start.

custom.chat: Please refrain from posting any sensitive and/or confidential messages.

about.title: Welcome to Daily Challenges
about.text: Every day you will get two challenges that you can complete in return for rewards such as in-game currency.
about.text2: Challenges are automatically generated per day and are not based on your current skill level, or based on your activity. These challenges are generated in a way that may promote you to play the game more, and even expand into places that you typically do not visit while playing!

login.title: Sign In
login.descr: Select from one the following options

home.slogan: Take your typing to the next level

hero.content1: If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact us on Discord or directly through <1>support@keyma.sh</1>.
hero.content2: Oh yeah, forgot to mention... We are always looking for community contribution including text submissions, language translations and more! <1>Click here</1> to learn more.

schools.title: Can schools use this?
schools.content1: <1>Absolutely</1>. Our Learning center is offered to any typist with or without an account however we strongly recommend having an account to save progress.
schools.content2: This service is <1>free</1> for anyone around the world and we use a simple grading system based off the United States.

tournaments.title: Daily Competitions!
tournaments.content1: We host tournaments to test typists skills <1>every day</1>. With an additional tournament every Sunday for a chance to win <1>Discord Nitro</1>.

custom.title: Playing with friends is so easy
custom.content1: Within a click of a button you can start your own private room where any of your friends and family can join in. We offer full customization and even allow the ability to watch another player type!

tournaments.title: Competitions
tournaments.none: No players have participated yet, be the first!

queue.shortcut: Did you know that using <1>CTRL+ALT+I</1> can get you here faster?

quickplay.title: Quick Play
quickplay.description: Join a match anywhere instantly worldwide

ranked.title: Ranked
ranked.description: Place yourself against the world of competition

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Play with your friends and family
custom.none: There are currently no public lobbies.

queue.practice: You are playing in a <1>practice</1> match. Your scores will not be saved.
queue.cooldown: You are already in a match, please wait {{count}} second then try again.
queue.cooldown_plural: You are already in a match, please wait {{count}} seconds then try again.

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Play matches that only use quotes from movies, music and authors.

dictionary.title: Dictionary
dictionary.description: Play matches that only use dictionary texts.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.removeconfirm: Are you sure you want to remove your notifications?

profile.refresh: This page will refresh after pressing save changes.
